code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{addToCart as _addToCart}from'../../Redux/shopping/shopping-actions';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductDetail=function ProductDetail(_ref){var currentItem=_ref.currentItem,addToCart=_ref.addToCart;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container product__detail__content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"prod-image-content col col-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"large-prod-img",src:currentItem.image,alt:currentItem.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item_details col col-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"details_title",children:currentItem.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"details_rating",children:currentItem.rating}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"details_description",children:currentItem.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"details_price",children:["Rs ",currentItem.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return addToCart(currentItem.id);},children:"Add To Cart"})]})]})});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{currentItem:state.shop.currentItem};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addToCart:function addToCart(id){return dispatch(_addToCart(id));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ProductDetail);
